page.title: 07BOY'S GAMES IN MINSTERLEY
page.content: Most boys like{football}& they all have favourite teams like Liverpool,Spurs,Manchester United & Everton.In the Summer boys like {cricket}& some like{tennis.}At school {chess & draughts}are played. Each year there is a chess tournament played between the primary schools. In the playground, as well as football & cricket, we play{huntsman, {marbles, conkers, tick}& we play on the{jungle gym}& the other equipment. Sometimes boys play{pool, darts &{bowls}in the village. There is a {playing field}in the village with {swings, a roundabout & a slide. Some boys play{war games}& make {dens.Hide & seek}is a good game. At home a lot of boys have computer games.
